column5: Our home offers spacious bedrooms and upstairs game/living area. The Antique Room, The Chess Room and The History Room. All three can be reserved for larger families. - The front porch is beautiful and a great place to sip coffee or eat breakfast in the mornings. The evenings can be spent in the back sitting area where there is a small water pond, a Wi-Fi television and a daybed for relaxing. - We would love to welcome you into our home. We know you will feel comfortable and relaxed.
